title: Fashionista Makeup & Dress Up
description: Fashionista Makeup & Dress Up is a dress-up game for all fashion enthusiasts and shopaholics! Get ready for an exciting weekend of fashion fun with our dress-up game! Explore a vast collection of stylish outfits, accessories, shoes, and jewelry to elevate your sense of style. Indulge in designer clothes from renowned boutiques and transform your doll into a rich and glamorous it girl. Experience the luxurious lifestyle of billionaires and millionaires without spending real money. Create multiple stunning looks, experiment with hairstyles and colors, and let your imagination run wild.
